topic.title: Identifying the First Swift Proxy Server

body.p:
Perform the following steps to identify the first node which is running the swift-proxy service:
Log in to the lifecycle manager.
View the following file:cat ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible/hosts/verb_hosts
Search the entry with the name SWF-PRX-<cloud-name>-<control-plane-name>-<cluster-name>:children.
The server which appears first in the SWF-PRX list is the first Swift proxy server.
For example, for cloud helion, control plane cp1, and cluster c1 it would look like this: [SWF-PRX-control-plane-1-cluster1:children] helion-cp1-c1-m1-mgmt helion-cp1-c1-m2-mgmt helion-cp1-c1-m3-mgmt
In the above example, the first swift proxy server is helion-cp1-c1-m1-mgmt.
